ema keti kalaya thula methek sidu karanu labu pa්rathisanskaranayan sampurna kara ganimath, anekuth athyawashya pa්rathisanskarana yojana sakasima ha nithigatha kirima ha eewa ki්rayathmaka karawa ganime yantha්ranayan pihituwa ganima ha eewa adhikshanaya kirime yantha්ranayan sakasima apage mulikathwayen sakas kara gatha yuthuwa thibe. 1 19wana wyawasthawata nawatha sanshodhanayak (ehi di wyawasthadayaka sabhawata siwil samaja niyojitha sankhyawa wadikara ganima athuluwa pasugiya parlimenthuwe di sanshodhana ya wu ha kapi giya anekuth yojana athulath kara ganima) 2 wiganana panatha, thorathuru panatha, dushana wirodhi parikshana shakthimath kirima sadaha awashya yantha්ranaya shakthimath kirima ha dushana walakwima sadaha allas komisama thawa duratath shakthimath kirima 3 mathiwarana sanshodhana panatha sammatha kirima 4 wyawasthadayaka sabhawa haraha siyaluma swadhina komishan sabha kadinamin path karawa ganima ee sadaha sudusukam athi swadhina komasariswaru ha niladharin path karawa ganima sadaha katayuthu kirima.

shri lankawa sambandhayen siya nirikshana idiripath karana eksath jathinge kamituwa athadanguwata ganime patan pudgalayan muhuna dena hirihara, wadhahinsa gana thorathuru labi athayi prakasha karana athara idiripathwa athi chodana sambandhayen wibhaga karana men shri lanka aanduwata nirdesha kirimak da karayi.

yuga yuganthara deshapalana wansha kathawehi palana thanthraya widhimath saha janatha subasadhanaya gunathmakawa ihala nanwimath, gamath palana thanthrayath athara mana mahajana sabandathawayak godananwimath mukhya paramarthaya karaganimin, pawathi gamsabha kramawedaya wenuwata pradeshiya sabha kramawedaya sthapitha wanne nawa prabodhayakata mulapuramini.“paripalana ha sanwardhana katayuthuwalata adalawa thirana ganime kriyawaliyehi janathawata palath mattamin paladayi lesa sahabhabhagi wima sandaha wadi awastha salasadime aramuna athiwa, pradeshiya sabha pihituwima sandaha da ema sabhawala balathala, karyayan saha karthawyayan nishchaya kirima sandaha da eeta sambandha ho anushangika siyalu karunu sandaha widhi widhana salaswima udesa da eki kramawedaya palana thanthrayata ek wanne 1987 anka 15 darana pradeshiya sabha sthapitha kirime panatha prakarawaya.2011 wasare, palathpalana aayathana 235k sandaha wu mahajana niyojithayin thorapathkara ganime punchi chandayak dan awasan ya.
